title: Senior Backend Engineer
summary: Experienced Senior Backend Engineer with a strong background in building scalable and robust distributed systems. Proven ability to design, develop, and deploy high-performance APIs and microservices using Python, Java, and Go, coupled with extensive cloud experience in AWS. Passionate about clean code, system architecture, and optimizing data processing workflows to deliver impactful solutions.

cloud: AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, SQS, SNS, DynamoDB, EKS)

description: Led the design and implementation of a new microservices architecture using Go and Kafka, improving system scalability and reducing latency by 25%.
Developed high-performance RESTful APIs for critical business logic, processing over 10,000 requests per second with Python (FastAPI) and PostgreSQL.
Mentored junior engineers, conducted code reviews, and established best practices for software development and deployment.
Managed and optimized cloud infrastructure on AWS using Terraform, reducing operational costs by 15%.
Designed and implemented data ingestion pipelines for large-scale datasets using Python and Django, handling up to 1TB of daily data.
Developed and maintained core API services for data analytics platform, serving various internal and external clients.
Optimized database queries and schema designs for MySQL and MongoDB, improving query response times by 30%.
Collaborated with front-end teams to integrate new features and resolve technical challenges in a fast-paced agile environment.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
